# applications

**Instance Property**

The user’s application activity that contributed to this category’s [doc://com.apple.DeviceActivity/documentation/DeviceActivity/DeviceActivityData/CategoryActivity/totalActivityDuration].

## Declaration

```swift
var applications: DeviceActivityResults<DeviceActivityData.ApplicationActivity> { get }
```
